body: Dear Sir,I hope you are doing well. I wanted to inform you that an OHE (Overhead Equipment) and other issues between Vashi and Nerul have once again caused significant disruptions to train services, with no clear indication of when normal operations will resume.Given the situation, I kindly request your permission to work from home today to remain productive despite the travel challenges.Thank you for your understanding.
summarized_body: The email informs the recipient about train disruptions between Vashi and Nerul due to OHE and other issues, causing uncertainty about when normal operations will resume. The sender requests permission to work from home today due to the travel challenges.
translated_body:
## Asunto: Disrupciones en el tren y solicitud de trabajo desde casa

Hola [Nombre del destinatario],

Te escribo para informarte que hay interrupciones en el servicio de trenes entre Vashi y Nerul debido a problemas con la catenaria y otros inconvenientes. Todavía no se sabe con certeza cuándo se reanudarán las operaciones normales.

Debido a estas dificultades de transporte, te solicito permiso para trabajar desde casa hoy. 

Gracias por tu comprensión.

Saludos,
[Tu nombre]

body: Dear Sir,I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to inform you that I am feeling unwell due to a case of food poisoning that started early this morning. As a result, I am experiencing symptoms that make it difficult to commute to the office.In light of this, I kindly request your approval to work from home today, as I would still like to be productive despite my current condition.Thank you for your understanding.
summarized_body: The email informs the recipient that the sender is experiencing food poisoning and is unable to commute to the office. The sender requests permission to work from home for the day, stating they still want to be productive despite their illness.
translated_body:
Hola [Nombre del destinatario],

Te escribo para informarte que estoy experimentando una intoxicación alimentaria y no podré ir a la oficina hoy. A pesar de mi malestar, me gustaría solicitar permiso para trabajar desde casa. Me siento lo suficientemente bien para ser productivo y me gustaría mantenerme al tanto de mis responsabilidades laborales.

Por favor, házmelo saber si esto es posible.

Gracias por tu comprensión.

Atentamente,
[Tu nombre]
